storyInfo: A mysterious bounty hunter seizes Liang Xun's hidden goblet, leaving Lee no option but to partner with Miss Du and head out. The spirits attached to household wares gradually begin to proliferate, becoming a bona-fide nuisance.

attributes.text: I suddenly realize, ever since I came to Shangshu, I haven't had a proper sleep.
There's a great commotion outside. It seems two people are fighting.
But I know their fight isn't because of each other. They're fighting over me, and that cup.
I've always considered myself fine at reading people. I've guessed, too, that this can't all be that simple.
My premonitions have never been far off the mark either. So I've prepared two letters, sat on the table.

attributes.content: Let's not trouble our Mr. Liang for now.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But I am curious. Are you just allowed in or out of the Liang estate whenever? Liang Xun might not put on government airs, but this has to be a little too careless.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Stop there!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) Crikey, my list didn't have nothin' about this sheila!
attributes.name: Travel-Weary Woman

attributes.content: Hmph. Nowhere to run.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Who sent you?!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Wait, you're not even Yanese! Where did you come from?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Here I was thinking you kicked the bucket in your sleep.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (Are these beasts long-snouted slumberfoots?)
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: She was clearly scheming something outside your room. You think do-gooders do that?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) I'm not secret here anymore, so it's in for a penny, in for a pound...
attributes.name: Travel-Weary Woman

attributes.content: Er, okay, Rim Billitonian woman, hold your beasts...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: This is the Shangshu magistrate's land. I don't mind either way, but getting on the court man's bad side won't do you any favors.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) You're able to rabbit on in the ol' Rim Bil?
attributes.name: Travel-Weary Woman

attributes.content: Roughly.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: May I have your name, young woman? And what are you paying your very bold visit here for?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ye Ban. Blacknight.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Why were you ignoring me if you could speak Yanese?!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You're a Rim Billitonian, but you have a Yanese name?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's not the point. I really don't end up in these situations, but I'm not looking for too much trouble in this city anyway.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: A hunt with no traps and no plan is a hunt just waiting to fail.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Give it up. You're not pulling any schemes here with me on the scene.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Miss Du's a temperamental sort.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So you two are working together.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: This works out just fine, actually. While you've been focusing on me...
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Light, Drill!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Wrroooaw—!
attributes.name: Nearby Howl

attributes.content: (There's more slumberfoots!)
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Gah! It's got the goblet in its mouth!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: See you never!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Hold it right there!!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Hey! What dimension are you living in? After her!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Long-snouted slumberfoots don't live in Yan, let alone keeping a cadre of tame ones as your partners in crime. This woman's probably come chasing us from somewhere else entirely.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What are you still thinking about? If I didn't help you, she would've trapped you to death right there!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: No, I wouldn't say she was after my life.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Cool, you lost the goblet, and you don't even act like you care. Aren't you scared Mr. Liang's gonna chew you out?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Now I've lost the cup, and your hopes have come true. Isn't that just dandy?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Tch... Fine, I said that, but if this spirals out of our control, what do we do then?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I just wanted my dad to suck it for once. I didn't think the whole Association would be done for.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Where's Liang Xun?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Benefactor, this... matter you raise... it's far beyond the pale. You'll have to let me absorb this slowly.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Don't blame you. I've known Nian forever, but I still need some time to take this in.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: And you told me without the slightest reservation.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You're a Rhodes Island operator too.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Right you are, benefactor.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: But... whether or not we agree with it, having a nation's top organizations watching Rhodes Island so closely... doesn't make for easy sleeping at night.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: The Sui Regulator, the Ministry of Rites. Just their names alone are intimidating.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Yet I didn't quite pick up on any malice when they spoke to us, you know?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Perhaps we've taken 'Nian's household affairs' too simply.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Eugh. Should at least have Amiya and the Doctor know about this before we make any calls...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: But it's not like Closure and Amiya'd have no idea about this, right...? But they agreed to Nian's requests too, back then...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: And who knows if Lava's given the branch office a shout yet.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Benefactor, given things are currently brewing up a storm, perhaps we should put our own safeties first, don't you think, or...?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: We'll discuss this with Mr. Lee first. Nian be damned, but Dusk's not somebody who makes things mysterious on purpose.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: If what she said was true, then it looks like this whole thing has a lot more moving parts than we thought...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: A safe proposition. That's my benefactor.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You say that when Yan's Sui Regulator's already come knocking. Don't think safe's the day of the word here—
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Benefactor...? What has you furrowing your brow?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: This thing's—
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Ao!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: —! Nothing, move it!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: ...Oho!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Wh—What in the world...?!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Fphhh...
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: What? Is this some... metal animal?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: W—Wait, that's a teapot, that's a painting frame... Are these things alive—?!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Where did these things crawl out from—h-hold on, has that teapot grown legs?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Wrroooaw—!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Wargh!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Watch out, benefactor!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: A fair, square hit!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: (Wails)—!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Looks like that works—!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: —Slow down, this—thing's turned back into a common paperweight...?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: (Damn—they're all over the place here—!)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Aaaaow!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: —Benefactor!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: What's happening? You're making lots of noise here... um, uh, why's that flowerpot moving...?
attributes.name: Curious Passerby

attributes.content: Waaaagh—what's going on?! What are these things?!
attributes.name: Panicked Passerby

attributes.content: Where did this miscellany all come from...?!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: (Oh! What did I just step on?)
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Did this—fall out of my benefactor's bag?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Pfhh?
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Nothing!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Ao—!!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Geh!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: What are you all charging at me for?!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: There's one more!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: That one was narrow! Much thanks, benefactor!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Ow—ow, ow...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: But what could possibly be happening? Could there possibly even be more scoundrels working against us?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: I've got this feeling I've seen these things somewhere before...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Erk, you're right! They practically seem an homage to Miss Dusk's Ink Spirits!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Fphhh...
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Wargh! Were there still leftovers?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: They're all coming at the charm Nian gave to Lava. That settles it—
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: —They have to be pretty much like Ink Spirits!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Liang Xun...!
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Lee.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: The cup got stolen?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I was careless. It seemed to be a beastmaster's tame beast that did it...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Wasteland long-snouted slumberfoots have a special organ in them. There's some kind of hypnotic substance they can secrete.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But none of the sort live in Shangshu. Someone skilled, strong, and in command of beasts that put people to sleep? A fine accomplice if you're out to steal a cup.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And the thief's not even with the inn people.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You ascertain that much?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You're not surprised at all. You figured it out long before I could, I'm guessing?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The look on your face tells me this one was definitely unexpected.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Any immediate suspicions?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I didn't tell anyone at all where the cup was hidden.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I think you told someone else I had it on me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I did indeed say that.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: That's good, then.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But look at this study. Completely neat and tidy, just missing that case you hid the cup in.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So who can get into your study, and who could send someone to sticky-finger the cup on such short notice?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: —Don't—Don't tell me too much. I'm scared I'll get my feet caught in your bureaucratic vines.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Do you need my help to bring the one behind that thief to light?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Reclaiming the goblet should come first.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Moreover, hunting that one down... would be too hasty.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Hey, little girl.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I have a name!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You're so slow about everything... What did Mr. Liang say to you?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Some quite perplexing things, but absolutely not to do with your old dad this time.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Tch...
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Seems our Miss Du Yaoye does like her father after all.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You said how you were all for young against old, and how you didn't even want to take this job, but you've got other ideas too, don't you?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: N-No talking about me for now! You know what's happening, so think how we can haul her back in, quick!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Easy enough.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That Blacknight had real freak skills. You think it's so simple to get her?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: We're just in luck. The better the skills, the easier they take the bait.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But what's important is, as a Rim Billitonian, how she chased her way into Shangshu. And who it is controlling her behind the scenes.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: She's not from Lungmen?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I didn't hurry too fast from Lungmen to Shangshu. If she really was out tracking me down, she could've pulled things off at any Messenger station. Why wait to move until I'm on the Liang estate?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Not to mention, a Rim Billitonian wantonly raiding a Yan magistrate? Either she's an idiot, or someone's using her.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hah. Doesn't that make her an idiot either way?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Not necessarily. People do act naive at times.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: When?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: When they want something from someone very badly.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Are you trying to tell me something?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You're imagining things.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Will Rhodes Island really do something just because you left that letter in your room?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: We have a level of trust.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Do you know them that well?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Good people always know each other well.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: His door's open... but where's Mr. Lee?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Benefactor, there's two letters here. It seems one's meant for us.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Let's see...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Benefactor, I admit I've been holding in my curiosity. Just what kind of person is this Brother Lee?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: ...Err.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: He's a detective. Had dealings with Rhodes Island since a while ago now... well, mainly the kids from his agency have.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: But little by little, him and us have gotten familiar.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I see, a detective... no wonder he's so meticulously minded. By his wardrobe, I would've guessed him to be some manner of tianshi with a mild hand for Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: What did Brother Lee write, then?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Says...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Read it for yourself.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: 'Cup was taken. Find Master Shen at ferry crossing,' and...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: W... Well, he really hasn't taken us for outsiders. Master Shen would be that boatman of some admittedly suspicious intrigue, no?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: If we don't get this sorted properly, Rhodes Island can kiss goodbye to not getting involved. Better we listen to Mr. Lee for now.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: He predicted this situation'd get more complex, so that's why he didn't want us involved at the beginning... Does this really mean he saw all this coming?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: How come you're out of things to say now? Really? We haven't run that far yet.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: And can you tell me how you know they're gonna listen to your letter at all?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: If I start telling a youngster like you, Miss Du, it'll be your fault when you get bored.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You love pretending you're so mature... That's why I hate all you kung fu nutjobs.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You've got the wrong idea there. I run a licensed detective agency.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Does being the boss of one guarantee you're a detective?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What, you're wasting all this effort just to find this goblet's owner and nothing else? You swear?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Of course there's more. I want my own answers, too.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Y-You know, if what you say is true, couldn't that Blacknight bandit seriously just leave Shangshu?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: A thief with knowledge of how Magistrate Liang's study is laid out? She must be somewhere nearby, off to meet her puppet master.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And on the off chance she scrams?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: If a Rim Billitonian can get out safely after stealing the magistrate's property, then someone wants her leaving—or to put it the other way around, she's going absolutely nowhere.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Guaranteed?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Not that guaranteed, actually. It'll just be a gamble.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Then we're too late then, aren't we?!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: If worst comes to worst and she did scarper on us, then with your help, we'll just get her back.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Easy for you to say! How am I meant to know which way she went?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Well, if they've come prepared, then how do you find a single person in a Shangshu-sized haystack? Is one pair of eyes and one pair of legs going to do the trick for you, Miss Du?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Then what can... wait...
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: It's not me who wants that lousy goblet, either.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Someone's stolen it? Brilliant. We'll go see just what fins those anglers are trying to fish up with it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Do you already have guesses for who they are...?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: All I'll do is ask is that you all take your seats.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Very rare you should call for me so early in the morning, my Lord.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Miss Ning...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: The camellias in the roadside garden have bloomed. Have you seen them?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: You were the one who planted them.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Yes, much thanks to your tender care for them.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: You truly let your own garden run wild. 'Tis become a means for me to kill my time.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I will sprinkle a few red plums next time, then.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: As you wish.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Why such agitation, my Lord?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: There's something I wish to consult you on, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Well, will you say it? Since when could you no longer say things straight, Liang Xun?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: It's to do with that friend of mine.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Do you not trust me?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I have always trusted you, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Really? If so, why do you ask to confirm before you speak?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Er. You are completely right...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Though I do not mind the walk to see you, 'twould not be just to ask me some questions that you called for me, so rare that is?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: If I have displeased you, I humbly apologize.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Haha. Why the nervousness? Am I so frightening?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Yesterday morning, I went to old Zhao's jewelers', and had repairs on the bracelet you gave me. At noon, I went to Miss Wen's shop to pick furniture; I have long wanted a larger dining table...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: After, I went with Miss Wen to meet her husband at the dock.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: In the afternoon, we ate our meal at Chef Hu's, talked of everyday domestics...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Finally, I went to Uncle Bai's, watched him teach his potter apprentices, and went on a stroll with him.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Is there anything you still wanted to ask, my Lord?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: The bracelet I gave you was just an ordinary silver one. It's not of great worth.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Really, may I not like it if it is not of great worth?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I hear Uncle Bai has had a cold the last few days. He's admittedly getting on in years; he's at the point he should be minding his health.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: He will.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: But Uncle Bai has been pottering in Shangshu for ten years now, every afternoon and for six hours. Thunder could not move him.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Habits become nature; there will be no exhorting him now.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: You met all five of them, throughout all of yesterday?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: 'Tis routine matters.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I understand now.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So, now you have finished questioning me, you shall next be heading out, my Lord, shall you not?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: It's almost daybreak.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: 'Tis early to be visiting the theater, no?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Not a suitable time, indeed.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: And you know my body is frail...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I will go and brew some tea, then. You wait.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Oh, yes. Miss Ning, the book you borrowed yesterday from my study... have you finished reading it?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: It's day now.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: But the snow still hasn't melted.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I have something I need to ask you too.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Do you see these... little whatsits multiplying?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Phhh... ao!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: What is this?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Fphhh...
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: If these things appear because of that goblet...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Then that means we bet on the right street.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (...They haven't followed me? I'm finding this too easy.)
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Let's see this letter... that storyteller has seemingly changed profession? Pottery? Pottery what...)
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Where are you going?
—Who is that?!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Why is that 'unaccounted-for' goblet in your grasp?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Gkh...
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Ao?
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Wrrao!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Gkh... gkh...?
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Gkh...
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Ao...
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: So you *are* here.
attributes.name: Dusk
